topic.title: Cleaning your Kitchen and Workspace
topic.shortdesc: Dirty Kitchen? Clean it up! A key factor that will make this breakfast enjoyable is having a clean kitchen to work with.

body.p: Here are a few helpful tips and ways to clean the kitchen effectively.

li.p: The best way to begin the cleaning process is to clear of the counter tops as much as possible. This will allow for you to wipe them down.
De-clutter the counters once they are wiped down, remove anything that is not a necessity from the counter.
Be careful when using cleaning products. Make sure the products are being used correctly and on the right appliances.
It may be a good idea to empty the dishwasher so clean up is easier and you can easily load it after the meal is finished!
With that being said, make sure that there are dishes, silverware, and glass clean and available!
